title: Target and Biomarker Exploration Portal for Drug Discovery
description: This portal is a web-based bioinformatics tool designed to accelerate the drug discovery process by integrating large-scale biomedical data with network analysis techniques. It provides researchers with a user-friendly interface to explore potential drug targets and biomarkers, facilitating the identification of novel therapeutic strategies.
